translation.en: Do you wanna be entertained? Don't change the channel.
translation.ko: 재미난 걸 찾고 있나요? 그럼 채널 고정하세요 앞으로 2분 안에

translation.en: Because in two minutes, I will die before your eyes.
translation.ko: 그럼 채널 고정하세요 앞으로 2분 안에 내가 여러분 눈앞에서 죽을 거니까

translation.en: I've leaked my location to your overlord, Eden Innovation Technologies,
translation.ko: 여러분의 지배자인 에덴 이노베이션 테크놀로지에 내 위치를 노출했거든요

translation.en: a corporation that rose from a crumbling empire
that was once called the United States of America.
Crime, poverty, anarchy.
Eden made it all disappear by bringing UBI,
translation.ko: 에덴은 그 모든 걸 UBI를 들여와 없앴어요

translation.en: Universal Basic Income, an idealist stipend for obedience.
translation.ko: 바로 보편 기본 소득, 복종의 대가로 주는 이상적인 급여죠

translation.en: Yeah. Eden saved you. They brought you stability.
translation.ko: 네, 에덴이 여러분을 구했어요 에덴은 안정을 가져왔고 이제 여러분은 자유죠

translation.en: You're free now. Mm-hmm.
translation.ko: 에덴은 안정을 가져왔고 이제 여러분은 자유죠

translation.en: You're free to work, as long as it's for Eden.
translation.ko: 에덴을 위한 거라면 여러분은 자유롭게 일할 수 있고

translation.en: You're free to eat, as long as it's Eden's food.
translation.ko: 에덴의 음식이라면 얼마든지 먹을 수 있고

translation.en: Free to consume Eden's revisionist bullshit.
translation.ko: 에덴의 수정주의 헛소리를 실컷 취할 수 있어요

translation.en: And if you don't agree…
…they will instantaneously turn you into something you're not.
translation.ko: 그들은 즉시 여러분을 다른 뭔가로 만들어 버려요

translation.en: A monster. A terrorist to shoot on sight.
translation.ko: 바로 괴물 발견 즉시 쏴도 되는 테러리스트요

translation.en: No arrest. No trial. Just as they're about to murder me.
translation.ko: 체포도, 재판도 없어요 지금 날 죽이려는 것처럼

translation.en: So you bow before Eden,
regurgitating their propaganda in exchange for their daily handouts.
translation.ko: 매일 공짜 배급을 얻으려고 그들의 선전을 되뇌죠

translation.en: [distorted] But deep inside you, you know there is only one way out.
translation.ko: 하지만 출구는 하나뿐이라는 걸 마음속 깊숙이에선 알잖아요

translation.en: You're done being entertained.
There is another way. Join us.
translation.ko: 다른 방법이 있어요 우리와 함께 혁명에 동참하세요

translation.en: [distorted] Join the revolution.
translation.ko: 다른 방법이 있어요 우리와 함께 혁명에 동참하세요 "데드섹"

translation.en: [announcer] The Board of Directors, in association with Eden Burger, presents,
live from MegaCity 2,
it's The Eden Late Show, with your host, Rayman!
Whoo! Yeah! -Whoo! Okay. Thank you. Thank you so much. -[applause, cheering]
We got a fantastic show for you tonight with amazing guests.
translation.ko: 오늘 밤, 멋진 초대 손님과 끝내주는 쇼를 준비했는데요

translation.en: We're gonna have Blue from the Niji 6. Yeah, yeah, give it up.
translation.ko: 니지 6의 블루가 나와 있고요 네, 박수 부탁해요

translation.en: Also with us tonight, before his big steel-cage match on Saturday,
translation.ko: 그리고 한 분 더 계시죠 토요일에 아주 중요한 '철창 매치'를 앞둔

translation.en: champion of the Eden Wrestling Federation,
the Eden Nightmare, Cody Rhodes!
So stay with us. Stay tuned. We'll be back right af--
translation.ko: 함께해 주세요, 채널 고정 그럼 광고 후에…

translation.en: [viewer] Fuck off!
translation.ko: 좆 까! 그 새끼가 바쁜 게 뭔 상관이야?

translation.en: I don't care how goddamn busy he is. You know who I am?
translation.ko: 좆 까! 그 새끼가 바쁜 게 뭔 상관이야? 내가 누군지 몰라?

translation.en: You tell that fucker I'm his boss's boss's boss,
translation.ko: 그 새끼한테 난 보스 중의 왕 보스라고 하고

translation.en: and if he's not on the phone in five seconds,
he'll be catching mutant rats for dinner in the goddamn Wasteland.
translation.ko: 웨이스트랜드에서 돌연변이 쥐를 저녁으로 먹을 거라고 해

translation.en: Got it?
[figure in coat] Know what the worst part of living in a fascist, dystopian hellscape is?
translation.ko: 파시스트 디스토피아의 지옥 생활에서 최악이 뭔지 알아?

translation.en: The shit they put on TV.
[sighs] Come on, Dolph. Would you please stop moaning?
translation.ko: 적당히 해, 돌프 그만 좀 투덜대라고

translation.en: In two days, we're out of Eden, spending all our money on margaritas.
translation.ko: 이틀 후면 우린 에덴을 벗어나 마가리타를 실컷 마실 거잖아

translation.en: It would be easier to just rob a bank.
[chuckles] Well, I don't do easy, right?
And no bank in Eden's got untraceable credits and unlimited funds.
translation.ko: 추적 불가한 크레디트와 무제한의 자금을 보유한 은행은 에덴에 없어

translation.en: No, I tell you, that codec is a getaway ticket from this shithole.
translation.ko: 내 장담하는데 그 코덱이 이 똥통에서 벗어날 통행증이야

translation.en: No need to be so tense.
Oh, right. That one's metal.
Okay. Let's do this.
I'm just saying, Dolph.
Being a rebel outlaw means adapting to circumstance.
translation.ko: 범법자이자 폭도로 살려면 상황 적응 능력이 필요해

translation.en: You should learn to, uh, I don't know, embrace the chaos?
Do you know who you're talking to?
No, you do not interrupt me when I'm s--
You know these things give you brain cancer, right?
translation.ko: 이런 거 쓰면 뇌암 걸리는 거 알지?

translation.en: Wait, wait. Well, okay, what do you want? My-- my car? My money? [whimpers]
translation.ko: 잠깐, 알았어 뭘 원해? 내 차? 내 돈?

translation.en: Actually, we want you.
-What? -[sirens wailing]
[Dolph's partner groans] Fucking pigs. Never not there when you don't need 'em.
translation.ko: 빌어먹을 돼지 새끼들 필요 없을 때만 꼭 나타나지

translation.en: Dolph Laserhawk!
You are in possession of stolen property.
Your brain and body belong to Eden Tech Military.
translation.ko: 너의 뇌와 몸은 에덴 기술군 소유다

translation.en: [scanner] Scan complete.
-You good? -Yeah.
-Wait! [whimpering] -[partner] End of the road, asshole.
-What are you doing? -[partner grunts]
[sergeant] Oh shit!
You should get that guy on your three.
I don't backseat drive…
translation.ko: 네 운전 간섭 안 할 테니

translation.en: you don't front-seat shoot.
translation.ko: 나 총 쏘는 거 신경 꺼

translation.en: Fire!
Oh, let's play! Come on!
Oh shit.
[wolf-whistles] Barbecued pork. Mwah. Smells like justice.
Keep an eye on the road.
[car AI] You are now entering an antigravity road. All manual functions are disconnected.
translation.ko: 반중력 도로에 진입했으므로 수동 기능이 모두 해제됩니다

translation.en: [partner] Mmm? Fuck.
Can you hack into the system?
Mm-mmm. Takes too much time.
[sighs] I guess we're fucked.
Wish me luck. Dolph?
Damn. That's my boy.
-[grunts] -Uh-oh. Die!
[groans] Fucking idiot copper.
Dolph!
Come on, come on, come on, come on.
[grunts] Yes!
Dolph! I don't think we're gonna make it.
translation.ko: 돌프! 아무래도 안 될 거 같아!

translation.en: If you've got any good ideas, now is the time!
translation.ko: 좋은 생각이 있다면 지금이 그걸 쓸 때야!

translation.en: [mutters] Laserhawk!
[partner] You know, that was hot.
Oh, shut up.
That was close.
Carnage on the highway in the center of MegaCity 2 this afternoon.
translation.ko: 오늘 오후 메가시티 2 중심부의 고속도로에서 대혼란이 있었습니다

translation.en: A terrorist attack has killed 252 people and injured 367 others.
I would like to warn our younger viewers. Some of these scenes are… disturbing.
translation.ko: 아주 끔찍한 장면도 있으니 어린이는 시청 지도가 필요합니다

translation.en: The terrorists, Dolph Laserhawk and Alex Taylor, are still on the run.
translation.ko: 테러 용의자인 돌프 레이저호크와 알렉스 테일러는 현재 도주 중입니다

translation.en: Our valiant police force is on the case and will bring them to justice.
translation.ko: 우리의 용감한 경찰이 수사 중이며 정의의 심판을 내릴 것입니다

translation.en: But who is Dolph Laserhawk? Let's find out.
[narrator] The only son of an immigrant thief and a sex worker.
translation.ko: 이민자 출신 도둑과 성 노동자 사이에서 외아들로 태어나

translation.en: Addicted to crack at only nine years old.
Saved from certain death by Eden's Military Redemption Program.
translation.ko: 에덴의 군사 재활 프로그램 덕분에 죽음을 면할 수 있었습니다

translation.en: But all this time, Laserhawk was working in the shadows
translation.ko: 하지만 그동안 줄곧 레이저호크는 에덴의 공공의 적 제1호 밑에서 일하고 있었습니다

translation.en: for Eden's public enemy number one,
translation.ko: 레이저호크는 에덴의 공공의 적 제1호 밑에서 일하고 있었습니다

translation.en: Marcus Holloway.
The Hawk didn't hesitate to bite the hand that saved him.
translation.ko: 레이저호크는 자신을 구해 준 은인을 가차 없이 배신했습니다

translation.en: Tonight,
dive into a story full of sex, drugs, manipulation, and violence,
translation.ko: 오늘 밤, 섹스와 마약 기만, 폭력으로 가득한 이야기를 확인하세요, 바로…

translation.en: in…
translation.ko: 기만, 폭력으로 가득한 이야기를 확인하세요, 바로…

translation.en: Traitor.
[announcer] This program viewing is mandatory.
Every offender will get a 500-credit fine.
Fascinating. A must-watch for everybody.
[inhales] Now… I would like to take a moment and address these terrorists myself.
translation.ko: 잠시 개인적으로 이 테러리스트들에게 한마디 하죠

translation.en: Dolph Laserhawk, Alex Taylor, you've destroyed a city.
translation.ko: 돌프 레이저호크, 알렉스 테일러 당신들이 도시를 망가뜨렸어요

translation.en: Yes, you've injured innocent citizens of Eden, mothers, fathers, children,
translation.ko: 네, 에덴의 무고한 시민인 우리의 부모님과 아이들을 다치게 했고

translation.en: and you've killed officers of our precious police force.
But let me tell you this.
You will never, ever destroy our way of life.
translation.ko: 당신은 절대 우리 삶의 방식을 파괴하지 못해요

translation.en: Eden will stand fearless and more united than ever.
translation.ko: 에덴은 두려움 없이 전보다 더 단결할 거니까요

translation.en: Okay. Stay with us. Must Dance Live coming right up after the break.
translation.ko: 채널 고정하세요, 광고 후에 '머스트 댄스 라이브'가 방영되니

translation.en: We've got 500 UBI credits for you to win.
translation.ko: 500 UBI 크레디트 탈 기회를 놓치지 마세요

translation.en: [supervisor] Okay. Listen up.
I need one Level 2 bot engineer and two handlers.
Me! Me! Take me! I've got three kid--
translation.ko: 저요! 절 뽑아 주세요 애가 셋이고…

translation.en: [candidate grunts] Shut the fuck up! I'm the best engineer here.
[guard] Calm the fuck down!
translation.ko: 소란 피우지 마 안 그럼 두 눈깔 사이에

translation.en: Or else all you're gonna get is a fucking bullet between your eyes.
translation.ko: 소란 피우지 마 안 그럼 두 눈깔 사이에 총알을 박아 줄 테니까 알아들어?

translation.en: Open up.
Oh. Uh… Sorry. Mr. Vice President, sir.
May I ask who is this gentleman?
He's Mr. None Of Your Fucking Business, got it? Now open the gate.
translation.ko: 너 따위가 몰라도 되는 분이야 됐어? 문이나 열어

translation.en: A-All right. Sure.
[elevator] Please get out of the vehicle.
I'm sorry, sir, but you know the rules. Visitors are not allowed.
translation.ko: 죄송하지만 규칙을 아시잖아요 외부인 출입 금지입니다

translation.en: -No touching. -[blow lands]
Behind me, sir! You! Hands where I can s--
translation.ko: 제 뒤로 오시죠, 그리고 넌 손…

translation.en: Very clever move. I guess we go full-on stealth mode now.
translation.ko: 잘하는 짓이다, 이제 본격적인 은신 모드로 가야겠네

translation.en: [Alex] Here we are, at the heart of Eden's death machine.
translation.ko: 드디어 에덴의 살상 기계 심장부에 들어왔군

translation.en: An abyss full of stuff.
[Dolph] Are you sure the codec is in here?
[Alex] Of course, I'm sure. My source is airtight.
You know, come to think of it,
it's a clever idea from the Board of Directors.
You know, to hide the codec in the perfect haystack.
translation.ko: 코덱을 건초더미 같은 이곳에 숨긴 거 말이야

translation.en: [Dolph] Yeah, right. The Board of Directors has never had any good ideas.
translation.ko: 웃기시네, 이사회는 좋은 아이디어를 낸 적이 없어

translation.en: [Alex] Y-Yeah, I know where you're coming from, Dolph, but… think about the codec.
translation.ko: 네가 왜 그러는지는 아는데 코덱을 생각해 봐

translation.en: I mean, unlimited generation of real credits,
untraceable by Eden's security?
This thing's gonna make us rich.
translation.ko: 코덱 덕에 우린 부자가 될 거야

translation.en: [Dolph] Okay. This is it.
[scanner] TNS scan activated.
Welcome, Mr. Vice President.
[sighs] Thank God. I missed your beautiful face.
[Dolph] Let's get this over with.
It's a video game.
I-I know with that casing, it's kind of underwhelming,
but this is the real deal.
Just plug it into Eden's system, and the credits will flow.
translation.ko: 에덴의 시스템에 연결만 하면 크레디트가 쏟아져 나올 거야

translation.en: More than we'll ever need.
[Dolph] Alex…
I know.
[voice] Captain-fucking-Laserhawk.
A billion credits' worth of Eden upgrades, and you're here.
translation.ko: 에덴이 10억 크레디트나 퍼부어 업그레이드한 네 놈이…

translation.en: Stealing video games.
One! You're gonna give me that cartridge.
And two! You're gonna give yourself up, Captain Laserjoke.
translation.ko: 그리고 둘, 순순히 자수해 캡틴 레이저조크

translation.en: I'm gonna have to kill you for that terrible pun.
translation.ko: 그 썰렁한 조크 때문에 널 죽여야겠어

translation.en: -[fingers snap] -Hey! You're that guy from TV, right?
translation.ko: 잠깐, 너 TV에 나온 그 작자지?

translation.en: [Red stammers] I'm not "that guy from TV"!
I dedicated myself to this army,
translation.ko: 난 이 군대에 한 몸 바쳤는데

translation.en: and they picked you for their ultimate cyber soldier?!
translation.ko: 최상의 사이버 군인으로 너 따위를 뽑아?

translation.en: [exhales] Fucking identity politics ruin everything!
Here we go again.
[Red] Form the rainbow!
[Niji 6] Niji 6!
[Black] Ready to blow his face off, Red. [Red] No rockets.
translation.ko: - 저놈 면상 날릴 준비 됐어, 레드 - 로켓은 안 돼!

translation.en: Make sure Laserpigeon's cyber parts stay intact,
translation.ko: 저 레이저비둘기의 사이버 부품을 망가뜨리지 마

translation.en: so the boss can reinstall them.
[Yellow] You mean reinstall on you.
[Red] Yes. No! N-- That's not the point.
[Violet] I was just asking myself. Can I get the arm?
translation.ko: 궁금해서 그러는데 팔은 내가 가져도 돼?

translation.en: [Red] No, you cannot get the arm!
Is it too much to ask to focus on the mission?!
translation.ko: 임무에 집중해 달라는 게 그렇게 무리한 부탁이야?

translation.en: You know, I never really got the whole rainbow thing.
translation.ko: 솔직히 난 저 무지개 콘셉트 이해가 안 돼

translation.en: Yeah. Me neither.
[game voice] Get ready!
[game voice] Fight!
[game voice] KO!
-[Green groans] -[Red] Looking for this?
-[groaning] -[Red] You like that?
-[Dolph groaning] -[Red] There you go.
Laserjoke!
Dolph!
You didn't need to fight the whole gummy bear gestapo.
translation.ko: 저 젤리 곰 일당을 다 상대할 필요는 없었어

translation.en: [Dolph] I had to know you'd be safe.
Otherwise, this is worth nothing.
translation.ko: 안 그러면 이 짓이 무슨 소용이야?

translation.en: [Alex sighs] That's sweet of you.
But seriously, you didn't need to fight them.
translation.ko: 하지만 진짜로 걔들과 싸울 필요 없었다고

translation.en: -There is no happy ending to this. -[Dolph grunts]
My source had a price in exchange for giving me the location.
translation.ko: 내 정보원이 위치 정보를 대가로 요구한 게 있어

translation.en: The codec… for you.
[Dolph] What? You gave me up… for money?
[sighs] It's not nearly that simple.
This is bigger than you and me, Dolph.
translation.ko: 이건 너와 나를 넘어서는 일이야, 돌프

translation.en: The revolution must happen.
None of us are free until Eden falls,
translation.ko: 에덴이 무너지기 전엔 아무도 자유롭지 못한데

translation.en: and this gives me everything I need to make it.
translation.ko: 그걸 이루는 데 필요한 게 여기에 다 있어

translation.en: Those plans we made,
translation.ko: 에덴을 함께 떠나기로 한 우리 계획도

translation.en: leaving Eden together, that was just the job, right?
translation.ko: 에덴을 함께 떠나기로 한 우리 계획도 결국 이 일의 일부였던 거지?

translation.en: You were always gonna turn me in.
I do love you, but…
the cause is worth any sacrifice.
Hell of an apocalypse we're having, right?
-Can you please stop that? -[wrestler grunts]
translation.ko: 제발 그만 좀 할래? 집중이 안 되잖아

translation.en: -I'm trying to focus. -You got a problem, pig face?
translation.ko: 제발 그만 좀 할래? 집중이 안 되잖아 - 불만 있어, 돼지 면상? - 얘들아, 봐

translation.en: Guys, look!
translation.ko: - 불만 있어, 돼지 면상? - 얘들아, 봐

translation.en: Here. Let me help you.
Hey! Don't you fucking touch--
[chuckles] Sorry. I'm Jade.
-And this is Pey'j, my uncle. -[Pey'j] Okay. I'm all right.
translation.ko: - 이쪽은 우리 삼촌 페이지 - 난 괜찮아

translation.en: [Jade] Oh yeah. The genius over there is--
Hey! I'm Cody Rhodes!
And I'm supposed to be fighting for the championship tomorrow!
And you're Captain Dolph Laserhawk,
ex-Eden special op and now public enemy number two.
translation.ko: 전직 에덴 특수 요원이자 현재 공공의 적 제2호지

translation.en: Smile.
Or don't. Where are we?
I don't know. We just woke up here like you did.
translation.ko: 몰라, 우리도 당신처럼 깨어나 보니 여기였어

translation.en: I think we were drugged or something.
-Huh? -[Pey'j] Jesus!
[hooded figure] I can feel the blood of my Brotherhood trying to say something to me.
translation.ko: 우리 형제단의 피가 나한테 무슨 말을 하려는 게 느껴져

translation.en: We are here for a reason.
Our memories live on past us, embedded in the DNA of our ancestors.
translation.ko: 우리의 기억은 조상의 DNA에 새겨져 우리보다 오래 살아

translation.en: That's a fucking frog.
[Dolph] Yeah. That's a frog.
Yes. I'm a frog, all right?
But, uh… First and foremost, I am from the Brotherhood of the Assassins.
My name is Bull--
-Jesus! -[Dolph] That's a strange name.
Wait. Wait, look. There's something in there.
translation.ko: 잠깐, 좀 봐, 저 안에 뭐가 있어

translation.en: Oh my God. This is the Supermaxx. Does this mean we are actually in the--
translation.ko: 어머나, 이건 슈퍼맥스야 그 말은 우리가 있는 곳이…

translation.en: I sense that an enemy approaches.
Yeah. We kinda get that too.
Okay, cool. We got numbers on our side. It's our best shot at escaping this pit.
translation.ko: 잘됐네, 우리도 쪽수론 안 밀려 이 지옥에서 탈출할 절호의 기회야 내가 신호하면 움직여

translation.en: You move on my signal.
translation.ko: 이 지옥에서 탈출할 절호의 기회야 내가 신호하면 움직여

translation.en: I am the Warden of Supermaxx, and I've got three things to say to you.
translation.ko: 난 슈퍼맥스의 소장이고 너희한테 할 말은 세 가지다

translation.en: Number one. -You're my-- -Now! [yelling]
Okay. I'm gonna skip right to number three, I guess.
Yeah, you got a bomb in your brain. And you do shit like that, boom.
translation.ko: 맞아, 머리에 폭탄이 있어서 저런 짓을 하면 '펑' 터지지

translation.en: So, back to number one. You're my prisoners.
translation.ko: 좋아, 다시 1번으로 돌아가서 너희는 내 포로야

translation.en: I brought you together because you each possess a unique quality.
translation.ko: 각자의 독특한 능력 때문에 이곳으로 데리고 왔지

translation.en: Number two. To the world outside, you don't exist anymore.
translation.ko: 2번, 바깥세상에서 너희는 더 이상 존재하지 않아

translation.en: Congratulations. You're now my new special team of operatives.
translation.ko: 축하한다, 너희는 내 특수팀의 신입 요원들이야

translation.en: If that's what this is, go ahead and execute me.
translation.ko: 그런 거라면 차라리 날 지금 처형해

translation.en: I'd rather be a corpse than work for Eden again.
translation.ko: 다시 에덴을 위해 일하느니 차라리 죽는 게 나아

translation.en: Oh, a shame. I thought you'd be interested in finding that boyfriend of yours.
translation.ko: 아이고 어쩌나 남자 친구를 찾는 데 관심이 있을 줄 알았는데

translation.en: [Dolph] What do you know? Speak. Now
[Warden] Well, if you shoot now, you'll never find out, will you?
translation.ko: 저런, 지금 날 쏘면 영영 못 알아낼 텐데, 안 그래?

translation.en: [Warden] Don't you worry.
You won't be working for Eden.
You'll be working for me.
Get some rest. Your first mission starts at 0800.
♪ Where's my lifeline… ♪
